app.title: Connection Cards
app.headline: Stop the small talk. Start talking for real.
app.subtitle: From cute to wild. One game.
app.tagline: AI cards designed to bring you closer.

headline.main: Stop the small talk. Start talking for real.
headline.sub: From cute to wild. One game.

home.subtitle: Discover the game that brings couples together through meaningful conversations and deeper intimacy.

features.title: Three Levels of Connection
features.subtitle: Progressively deepen your bond through carefully crafted conversation levels

level1.title: Ice Breaking
level1.description: Break the ice with fun conversation starters and light questions

level2.title: Getting Personal
level2.description: Dive deeper into personal stories and meaningful experiences

level3.title: Deep Intimacy
level3.description: Connect at the deepest level with intimate and vulnerable conversations

joinRoom.title: Join Your Partner
joinRoom.subtitle: Enter the code your partner shared with you

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Ask your partner for the 6-character code
instructions.step2: The code contains only letters and numbers
instructions.step3: Once connected, the game will start automatically

errors.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please check and try again.

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.step1: Create a room and get your unique code
howItWorks.step2: Share the code with your partner

waitingRoom.title: Game Room
waitingRoom.subtitle: Waiting for players to connect
waitingRoom.shareInstruction: Share the room code with your partner so they can join the game

together.title: Together
together.subtitle: Spoken responses • More intimate • Face to face

apart.title: Apart
apart.subtitle: Written responses • Long distance • Over chat

levelSelect.title: Intimate Cards
levelSelect.subtitle: Choose your intensity level
levelSelect.waitingPartner: Waiting for your partner to select level...
levelSelect.mustMatch: You've selected different levels. You must select the same level to play.
levelSelect.resetting: Auto-resetting... You can choose again in a moment.
levelSelect.connected: You're connected. Let's play! Starting in {{countdown}}...
levelSelect.agreed: Perfect! You both chose level {{level}}. Starting in {{countdown}} seconds...
levelSelect.bothChose: You both chose level {{level}}. Starting game...
levelSelect.votesSubmitted: You chose level {{level}}. Waiting for your partner...

errors.responseSaveFailed: Could not save response. Please try again.
errors.evaluationSaveFailed: Could not save evaluation. Please try again.
errors.insufficientDataDescription: Not enough data to generate connection report
errors.cardRecoveryFailedDescription: Unable to load question. Please refresh the page.

game.safetyNote: Remember to communicate and respect your boundaries

evaluation.title: Evaluate Response
evaluation.subtitle: How did {{player}}'s response make you feel?
evaluation.question: Question
evaluation.note: Your evaluation helps create a meaningful connection report
evaluation.honestyDescription: How genuine and authentic was the response?
evaluation.attractionDescription: How attractive did you find the response?
evaluation.intimacyDescription: How intimate and personal was the response?
evaluation.surpriseDescription: How surprising or unexpected was the response?

processing.title: Processing Evaluation...
processing.yourTurnNext: Get ready! It's your turn to respond next
processing.waitingForPartner: Your partner will respond to the next card

game.waitingForEvaluation: Waiting for {{player}} to evaluate your response...

fallbackQuestions.question1: What was your first impression of me?
fallbackQuestions.question2: What do you most admire about our relationship?
fallbackQuestions.question3: What is your biggest shared dream?

game.question: Question
game.spokenModeDescription: Respond verbally face-to-face. When finished, press continue.

notifications.partnerAnswered: Your partner answered the proximity question

notifications.differentLevelsSelected: You selected different levels. You must select the same level to play.

basic.title: Basic

levelUp.level3Description: Intimate and daring questions for maximum connection
